Posts.Content: Flocolan wrote: Hi! I am an 8 year survivor! Whooo hooo!! I went to see my doc today because I have had swelling (actually a lump right above my clavicle) on my non-cancer side....I understand that IBC can occur with the swollen clavicle as a symptom....is there anyone out there that has had a similar issue....I have had two battles and won each time but it was with my left breast....and now it is my right side....no other lumps...issues ....just the swelling....will have results back tomorrow ....doc seemed nervous ....ugh Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 8 Year Survivor with Swelling Above Clavical Flocolan ramade
